mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(endtime,'%Y%m') months,SUM(boxnumber) count from busi_voyage where loadcode='1' group by months UNION ALL select DATE_FORMAT(endtime,'%Y%m') months,SUM(boxnumber) count from busi_waybill where loadcode='1' group by months UNION ALL select DATE_FORMAT(endtime,'%Y%m') months,SUM(boxnumber) count from busi_voyage where unloadcode='1' group by months UNION ALL select DATE_FORMAT(endtime,'%Y%m') months,SUM(boxnumber) count from busi_waybill where unloadcode='1' group by months
